name: Rushy (Swendo Games)
description: A parkour game with fun mechanics. Try to finish the game as fast as possible. Compete with your friends. This game was made by Swendoz with Unity. CONTROLS Reach the portal without touching the lava! You can walk on walls colored like red. You can hook black blocks with your gun. Menu Music - mrpoly Game Music - HydroGene Victory Music - Spring Spring You can support me on Ko-fi. You can reach me on Twitter.
